desc: Guitar reference posters, piano chord charts and more. Music posters and songwriting journals that link to free online music lessons. Join 100,000 musicians using creative music posters, music notebooks and other educational guides to learn how to play guitar, piano and more.

layout.text: MUSIC POSTERS THAT LINK TO 150+ FREE ONLINE LESSONS
Learn how to play guitar easier and faster. Make the most of your time making music.
